body:
### Problem

Neovim does not handle the ServerCancelled LSP error code. Ideally, it should be managed in conjunction with [ServerCancellationData](https://microsoft.github.io/language-server-protocol/specifications/lsp/3.17/specification/#diagnosticServerCancellationData). However, an initial solution would be just suppressing the error.
![image](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/assets/70210066/4e27332b-9132-4237-977b-2fcd1a554d25)


### Steps to reproduce using "nvim -u minimal_init.lua"

```lua
--- minimal_init.lua
local pattern = 'luau'
local cmd = {'luau-lsp', 'lsp'}
local root_markers = {'.luaurc'}

-- This won't be required after luau-lsp's new release with commit a3b8daf
local capabilities = vim.lsp.protocol.make_client_capabilities()
capabilities.workspace.didChangeConfiguration.dynamicRegistration = true

vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd('FileType', {
  pattern = pattern,
  callback = function(args)
    local match = vim.fs.find(root_markers, { path = args.file, upward = true })[1]
    local root_dir = match and vim.fn.fnamemodify(match, ':p:h') or nil
    vim.lsp.start({
      name = 'luau-lsp',
      cmd = cmd,
      root_dir = root_dir,
      capabilities = capabilities,
    })
  end
})
```
`nvim -u minimal_init.lua test.luau`

### Expected behavior

Do not show -32802 (ServerCancelled) error.

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

NVIM v0.10.0-dev-2008+g4ee656e4f

### Language server name/version

luau-lsp@1.27.0

### Operating system/version

Windows 10

### Log file

_No response_
title: LSP ServerCancelled error should be hidden
